name: 藝術與西方文化
description: 本課程以全英語授課，目的在於使學生掌握以國際語言發表討論西方藝術文化的正確語彙知識與技能。將討論英國、德國、法國及義大利等地的藝術文化如何在其時代背景下發展。
goals: To gain knowledge about art and western civilization.
To promote creative and critical thinking skills.
To discuss issues about art and western cultures in appropriate English.
syllabus:
**Goal**:

For postgraduate student (MA, MFA, PhD) who is studying in art or design, this course is underlining some main concepts of modern art in western world.

Also, the aim of this course is trying to improve and clarify the ability of postgraduate students in English.

**Weekly schedule**:

1.  Introduction (pilot examination)
2.  What art is?
3.  Critical terms for art history (1)
4.  Critical terms for art history (2)
5.  Concepts of modern art (1)
6.  Concepts of modern art (2)
7.  Concepts of modern art (3)
8.  Group discussion of criticla points in art, art news. (1)
9.  Group discussion of critical points in art, art news. (2)
10.  Mid-term (1)
11.  Mid-term (2)
12.  Art today (1)
13.  Art today (2)
14.  Art today (3)
15.  Style and subject matter (1)
16.  Style and subject matter (2)
17.  Oral Presentation (Final)(1)
18.  Oral Presentation (Final)(2)

methodologies.note: The teacher will give lectures on important themes in western cultures.
Students will be asked to form different groups and discuss the issues in the text.
Students will work together as a team to conduct their projects.
We will visit museums and other exhibitions in the local galleries.
Website materials and other visual aids will be used to facilitate class activities.
Students will be asked to do their individual project and group project.
